story.kicker_image_caption: Tripura Class 10 results declared on www.tripuraresults.nic.i
story.storykicker: Tripura Board of Secondary Education (TBSE) has declared the results of the Class 10 board examination on the official website www.tripuraresults.nic.in, today i.e. June 2.
story.storybody:
Tripura Board of Secondary Education (TBSE) has declared the results of the Class 10 board examination today, i.e. June 2, on its official website www.tripuraresults.nic.in,

On May 21, the Tripura Board of Secondary Education (TBSE) had declared the results of the Class 12 science stream.

Steps to check the results:

  •  Log on to the official website, www.tripuraresults.nic.in or www.tbse.in
  • Click on the relevant link
  • Enter your roll number or name
  • Click on to submit
  • The results will be displayed
  • All the candidates are advised to take a print out of the same for future reference.

About TBSE:

Established in the year 1973, TBSE is a state agency of the government of Tripura, which is responsible for the promotion and development of secondary education, in the state. Most of the public schools of the state follow the TBSE system.  
 
Read: Street vendor's daughter tops Karnataka PUC exam

Read: Intel competition in US awards six Indian students

For exam related news click here.
